text: Rodolfo Goulart Damaggio (born April 11, 1965) is a Brazilian comic book artist, animator, concept artist and storyboard artist. ==References== ==External links== *Rodolfo Damaggio ArtStation *Rodolfo Damaggio biography on Lambiek *Rodolfo Damaggio at ComicBookDb.com * Category:Brazilian comics artists Category:Brazilian animators Category:Storyboard artists Category:Brazilian speculative fiction artists Category:Science fiction artists
title: Rodolfo Damaggio
